summary.span: 控制是否将 Unicode 字符转换为最接近的匹配 ANSI 字符。

span.span: Controls whether Unicode characters are converted to the closest matching ANSI characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此特性应用于程序集、 接口、 类或结构。You can apply this attribute to an assembly, interface, class, or structure. 默认情况下，公共语言运行时将转换为 ANSI 字符的任何托管 Unicode 字符传递给 Windows 98 或 Windows me 上执行非托管的方法By default, the common language runtime converts to ANSI characters any managed Unicode characters passed to an unmanaged method executing on Windows 98 or Windows Me. 最佳的映射使时不存在完全匹配选择近似匹配字符互操作封送处理程序。Best-fit mapping enables the interop marshaler to select a close-matching character when no exact match exists. 例如，该封送处理 Unicode 版权将字符转换为 c 接受 ANSI 字符的非托管方法。For example, the marshaler converts the Unicode copyright character to 'c' for unmanaged methods that accept ANSI characters. > [!CAUTION] > 某些字符缺少最佳的表示形式;这些字符称为无法映射。Some characters lack a best-fit representation; these characters are called unmappable. 通常，无法映射的字符将转换为默认值？ANSI 字符。Unmappable characters are usually converted to the default '?' ANSI character. 某些 Unicode 字符都转换为危险的字符，如反斜杠\\字符，会在无意中更改路径。Certain Unicode characters are converted to dangerous characters, such as the backslash '\\' character, which can inadvertently change a path. 提供两个参数来控制的最佳映射方面。 provides two parameters to control aspects of best-fit mapping. 第一个参数用于切换打开和关闭的最佳的映射。You use the first parameter to toggle best-fit mapping on and off. 默认值是`true`，从而使程序集、 接口和类级别上的最佳的映射。The default value is `true`, which enables best-fit mapping on the assembly, interface, and class levels. 应用于接口或类的属性将覆盖程序集级别属性。An attribute applied to an interface or class overrides an assembly-level attribute. 同样，可以启用或禁用最佳映射平台 invoke 调用通过使用字段。You can likewise enable or disable best-fit mapping for platform invoke calls by using the field. 平台设置的值调用字段替代的所有级别。A value set by the platform invoke field overrides all levels of . 你可以使用控件无法映射的字符上引发异常的第二个参数。You can use the second parameter to control throwing an exception on unmappable characters. 默认值为字段是`false`，引发异常每个哪些禁用时间运行时遇到具有要转换为 Unicode 字符？ANSI 字符。The default value for the field is `false`, which disables throwing an exception each time the runtime encounters a Unicode character that has to be converted to the '?' ANSI character. 即使最佳的映射是`true`，无法映射的字符生成了异常时字段是`true`。Even if best-fit mapping is `true`, unmappable characters generate an exception when the field is `true`. 若要增强安全性，可以切换到的第一个参数`false`和第二个参数`true`。To tighten security, you can toggle the first parameter to `false` and the second parameter to `true`. 此参数设置的组合将关闭，最佳的映射，但允许作为安全措施异常引发机制。This combination of parameter settings turns best-fit mapping off, but enables the exception-throwing mechanism as a safety precaution. > [!CAUTION] > 无法更改默认值由提供时将托管的数组传递其元素是 ANSI 字符或 Lpstr 到非托管的安全数组。You cannot change the default values provided by when passing a managed array whose elements are ANSI Chars or LPSTRs to an unmanaged safe array. 最佳的映射始终处于启用状态，并可能会引发任何异常。Best-fit mapping is always enabled and no exception can be thrown. 请注意此组合可能会危及你的安全模型。Be aware that this combination can compromise your security model. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何禁用最佳映射并转换到 Unicode 字符上引发异常？ANSI 字符。The following example shows how to disable best fit mapping and to throw an exception on the conversion of Unicode characters to the '?'
